comments:
With I20070221-1831 on Windows:
* New Connection, Type = Linux, enter hostname, Next
* Select dstore.files, Launcher, switch to Rexec, enter a server-path
* Press Next
* Select dstore.processes, Launcher
  --> Note that the Launcher is "Daemon" again, this is bug 174778
* Switch the Launcher to Rexec, enter a server-path
* Press Finish

--> Nothing happens. Following exception is logged:
